title: Beauty In Darkness
description: We've been enemies our entire lives, until an arranged marriage sparks a passion we can’t ignore…ROSETo save my father, I'm forced to marry the handsome, brooding wizard king--our kingdom's greatest enemy. Now I've been whisked away to his foreboding castle without even a chance to say goodbye to my sisters. Then I discover my new home holds dark secrets that threaten the entire land, secrets no one dares speak of—and my mysterious husband is at the center of them. He tries to push me away, but I see the hidden fire in his eyes, and I'll do whatever it takes to uncover the truth about his past and stop the shadows spreading across the land.RAITHI took a bride to end a needless war, but after my former wife's death I have no interest in a real marriage. My heart is cold and black, but Rose's beauty and boldness tempt me like no one else has done before. Every day it gets harder to resist her, but she must never discover the curse threatening the kingdom—or the dark depths of my soul.When darkness threatens to tear us apart, we'll have to find a way to stop it together—or doom our kingdom forever.Beauty In Darkness is a steamy adult fantasy romance, perfect for fans of Sarah J Maas, Jennifer L Armentrout, and Grace Draven.
author: Elizabeth Briggs
